summary: A young policewoman discovers an ecological scandal and has to face the corruption in the Milan Police department.
cast: Mariangela Melato|Orazio Orlando|Mario Carotenuto|Armando Brancia|Renato Scarpa|Gianfranco Barra|Umberto Smaila|Gigi Ballista|Renato Pozzetto|Alberto Lionello|Giuseppe Castellano|Lorenzo Logli|Antonietta Esposito|Umberto Travaglini|Pia Velsi|Giuseppe Caracciolo|Alvaro Vitali|Orazio Stracuzzi|Ugo Pace|Luigi Perrella|Gianni Solaro|Pietro Brambilla|Aristide Caporale|Belisario De Matteis|Dante Fioretti|Alba Maiolini|Enrico Vanzina
title: Giovanna la incorruptible
